vote.title: Authorize a construction contract for the construction of Street Reconstruction Group 17-8005 (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Camino Construction, L.P., lowest responsible bidder of ten - Not to exceed $1,557,167.80 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($1,073,104.00), Water Utilities Capital Improvement D Fund ($292,736.80), Water Utilities Capital Construction Fund ($18,100.00), Wastewater Utilities Capital Improvement E Fund ($168,077.00), and Wastewater Utilities Capital Construction Fund ($5,150.00)
